messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

new client setup oracle pm re client setup hello please find setup form cards attached thanks re client setup hi each user create client by himself side create code fill setup form please ask provide unclear please let kind regards analyst friday client setup hello please help setting client corresponding pre code client name cards lead pre code please let require additional information thanks
